segments.text: Mr . Blake ? Mr . Foster ’ s on the phone . He ’ d like to know if you can send over those training manuals ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , tell him I ’ ll leave them at his office tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was hoping that you could drop them off this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid that I can ’ t do that . They ’ re at the printer ’ s being copied . They ’ ll be back tomorrow before 1 o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2
